page.title: 16SERVICES IN POLBATHIC AREA.
page.content: THESE ARE VERY FEW,AND DWINDLING AS THE YEARS PASS.AT PRESENT, THE MOBILE LIBRARY VISITS FORTNIGHTLY, ONE GROCERY STORE IN DOWNDERRY DELIVERS GOODS TO ORDER, THE HARDWARE STORE IN ST.GERMANS DELIVERS WEEKLY,AND THERE ARE TWICE-WEEKLY VISITS FROM A FISHMONGER FROM POLPERRO. POST IS DELIVERED ONCE DAILY FROM TORPOINT. THERE IS NO GAS SUPPLY. ELECTRICITY IS BY OVERHEAD CABLES,BUT THERE IS STILL NO MAINS ELECTRICITY AT RYTHA AND BERRY COTTAGE.THERE IS VERY LITTLE MAINS SEWAGE.RYTHA HAS A SEPTIC TANK.
